forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain for the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with a steady rain this evening. Showers with perhaps a rumble of thunder developing overnight. Low near 10C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Thundershowers overnight following a period of rain and wind early. Low around 50F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers likely and possibly a thunderstorm in the morning, then some lingering showers still possible in the afternoon. High 12C. S winds shifting to NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers with a possible thunderstorm in the morning, then variable clouds during the afternoon with still a chance of showers. High 53F. S winds shifting to NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 6C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 43F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.
